help-file.title: "WEAPON ENCHANTMENT"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <weapon> Aggressive: N0 Cumulative: No Duration: Permanent Type of spell: Enchantment
"weapon enchantment" will enchant non-magical (non-modifying) weapons only. Non-modifying weapons are those that do not alter any ability. The only way to be certain if a weapon is suitable for enchantment is to fully identify it.
The level of enchantment given the weapon is random, depending upon conditions of the weather, magical energies, skill of the conjurer, and the blessings of the gods.
